p: Climate change would result in a shift of the suitable habitat of R. roxellana to higher elevations (Figure 3). The mean elevation of the suitable habitat in the 2050s was projected to be 2,183.66 ± 325.35 m, which is significantly higher ( Z = −3.554, p = 0.000) than the elevation of the currently suitable habitat (2,118.90 ± 315.94 m).
